name: Bedtime Blind
description:
Bedtime Blind

by David and Daniel Sohn

It's time to go to bed, but first, you need to turn off the lights.
Once the lights are off, however, you won't be able to see a thing!
Avoid hazards such as legos and monsters with the help of your trusty
candle, and make it back to bed safely!

Controls:
Movement - Arrow Keys/WASD
Take out/Put back Candle - Spacebar (will automatically be put back if you move)
Use Teleporter - Enter/Return Key
Open Menu - Escape Key

Known Bugs:
- Teleporters do not work sometimes.  Moving off and then back on seems to fix
this.

Assets used:
Casual Puzzle World Sounds by Poligons Sounds
https://poligonssounds.wixsite.com/poligonssounds

FREE Music for Puzzle Games by Aural Space
https://aural-space.com/

Western Audio & Music by John Leonard French
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/western-audio-music-67788

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

UI Sfx by Little Robot Sound Factory
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ui-sfx-36989
